titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that tax-exempt interest shall not be taken into account in determining the portion of social security benefits subject to income taxation.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H1791)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 3/31/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the requirement that tax-exempt interest be taken into account when determining the portion of social security and railroad retirement benefits that is subject to tax.
